response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and my offer reflects its true worth while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. I would like to propose purchasing the product for $1,350,000. This price not only allows you to benefit from the full value of the product but also ensures a profitable outcome for me. I believe this offer strikes a balance between our interests and expectations. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a successful business relationship.", "product_price": 1350000}
